titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of October 10, 2023, as "Real Women's Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the designation of Real Women's Day and opposition to forcing biological women and girls to compete against biological boys and men in girlsâ€™ and womenâ€™s sports.
